Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back ALL-INCLUSIVE UPGRADE TO PALACE CLUB LOUNGE View gallery / Back Nusa Dua Beach Hotel - Aerial View Nusa Dua Beach Hotel - Tamarind Restaurant Nusa Dua Beach Hotel - Lagoon Pool Nusa Dua Beach Hotel - Beach View Bali Nusa Dua Beach Hotel & Spa &vert; Return flights • 7 nights • Transfers • All Inclusive Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Nusa Dua Beach Hotel & Spa Nestled within 9 hectares of lush tropical landscape gardens, Nusa Dua Beach Hotel and Spa features all the elegance of a Balinese palace, exposing the beauty of local culture, yet offering modern amenities and convenience for a luxurious getaway. The newly renovated 382 guestrooms and suites embody charming Balinese ambiance. Each accommodation is equipped with air conditioner and offers stunning views of tropical gardens, pool or the ocean. The wide choice of accommodation is ideal for family holiday, honeymoon couples, groups of friends and more. View more View less 7 nights + flights, transfers, daily breakfast & more from $ 3639 per person share twin Flying with Air New Zealand ALL-INCLUSIVE UPGRADE TO PALACE CLUB LOUNGE Enquire now Sale Period : until 4pm on 14 Nov 25 or until sold out Deal Includes: Return Economy class airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Bali Add $150 per person return to fly from your nearest Air New Zealand serviced domestic airport Return airport to hotel transfers 7 nights accommodation Daily buffet breakfast Lunch - 3 course lunch Dinner - 3 course Dinner Daily afternoon tea between 3:00pm - 5:00pm Free flow of beverages including soft drinks, local mineral water, juices, local beer, local wines, local liquor, gin, vodka, whiskey, rum, cocktail, mocktail during operating hours at all Food & Beverage outlets. Enjoy a 50% discount on laundry services for items picked up in the afternoon (4:00 pm) and returned the next day Enjoy up to 25% discount on all spa and massage treatments from the regular spa menu Wi-Fi Exclusive benefits when upgrading to Palace Club Room: Access to Palace Club Lounge from 6.30am-11.00pm Private check in and check out at the Palace Club Lounge Welcome drink & cold towel upon check-in at Palace Club Lounge Welcome fruits & flowers upon arrival Daily Breakfast at Palace Club Lounge between 6.30am-11.00am Afternoon tea between 3.00pm-5.00pm at the Palace Club Lounge Evening Cocktail with assorted snacks between 5.30pm-7.00pm Complimentary non-alcoholic beverages between 11.00am-11.00pm Books collection (mini library), dvd's, newspapers and magazines at the Palace Club Lounge Complimentary access to the gym, Sauna, Steam room, Lap Pool and Jacuzzi Late check out until 3:00pm on day of departure Daily in room turn down services Complimentary pressing service for 4 (four) garments on arrival day Complimentary in room bottled water refreshed daily Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Superior Room The Superior rooms at Nusa Dua Beach Hotel feature traditional Balinese decor, modern amenities, and a private balcony with garden views. Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until 4pm on 14 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 28 Oct 25• Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Advertised packages are based on return Economy class airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Bali. Flights from Wellington or Christchurch go via Auckland. A surcharge of NZD$25 per person applies to any outbound flight on a Friday or Saturday or inbound on a Saturday or Sunday. • Any additional nights accommodation required due to flight schedules are at the customers expense • Min/max stays apply • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply • Bedding configurations may vary on twin share options • Twin share is two adults sharing a room using existing bedding • Meals may be from select menus or certain dining locations. Resort credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable and cannot be exchanged for cash • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and is a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Advertised prices are per person for cash or eftpos purchase only. Credit fees will apply. • Full payment is required at time of booking • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Flights and accommodation are limited and subject to availability at time of booking • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
